summary: A secure email notification from FirstBank's legal department regarding a federal grand jury subpoena related to Jeffrey Epstein, case number 19353. The message directs the recipient to log in to view the secure content.

events.title: FirstBank Secure Message Regarding Epstein Grand Jury Subpoena
events.description: FirstBank's legal department sends a secure email notification about a federal grand jury subpoena related to Jeffrey Epstein, directing the recipient to log in to view the message.

keyFacts: FirstBank sent a secure message regarding a federal grand jury subpoena related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The message is associated with FirstBank case number 19353.
The communication occurred on March 10, 2020, indicating ongoing legal proceedings related to Epstein after his death.
The document shows financial institution involvement in the Epstein investigation through subpoena compliance.
The secure nature of the message suggests it contains sensitive legal or financial information.
